title: Custom Components & Extensions
body:
Interaction innovation.

These components provide new ways to spice up your content and offer learners new ways of interacting.

title: The HTML Component
body:
One component - many applications.

The HTML component gives you more control and options for the way your content is displayed.
pageBody:
One component - many applications.

The HTML component is extremely versatile and suits those who are comfortable writing HTML and styling using CSS. This component lets you create your own template whilst also providing a useful default template which allows you loop through multiple strings or objects. Below are some examples of the different ways in which it can be used.
